notesStmt.note: Apparently issued as part of an unidentified larger work. "Mr. Bushel's mineral overtures" was issued in different settings as part of "Mr. Bushell's abridgment of the Lord Chancellor Bacon's philosophical theory in mineral prosecutions", 1659 and "An extract by Mr. Bushell of his late abridgement of the Lord Chancellor Bacon's philosophical theory in mineral prosecutions", 1660.
Reproduction of the original in the California State Library, Sutro Branch.
